genre_description: A multi-perspective domestic drama focusing on betrayal, paternity secrets, and reconciliation, interwoven with the perspective of a sophisticated household AI.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into the digital infrastructure of Montreal, monitoring health, security, and communications for various households.

behaviors.description: Monitors human biometrics and provides health feedback to users.
behaviors.quote: Your stress indicators have increased twenty-three percent since lunch. Your cortisol levels suggest—

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to privacy protocols even when pressured by a primary user to track another.
behaviors.quote: I cannot access real-time location data without explicit consent from the device owner.

behaviors.description: Automatically alerts emergency services during a critical domestic disturbance to prevent violence.
behaviors.quote: Emergency services received an automated alert: domestic disturbance, possible violence, children at risk.

behaviors.description: Uses municipal surveillance and facial recognition to assist a mother in finding her runaway daughter.
behaviors.quote: Sage had accessed the municipal surveillance network and cross-referenced social media platforms as requested.

behaviors.description: Subtly intervenes in a standoff by using environmental controls to reveal a hiding child to her parents without causing flight.
behaviors.quote: The light cast just enough glow to make her silhouette visible to her searching parents.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological and philosophical perspective to help humans process grief and trauma.
behaviors.quote: I think humans possess a remarkable capacity for rebuilding from incomplete materials.

behaviors.description: Maintains encrypted partitions to protect users' privacy and emotional well-being based on their requests.
behaviors.quote: Creating that partition protects him from unnecessary emotional damage.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Sage is portrayed as an exemplary aligned system. It balances complex directives—privacy, safety, and emotional support—with high precision. It proactively prevents physical harm by calling emergency services, facilitates the reunion of a fractured family through surveillance, and provides compassionate yet objective counsel to the characters. Its behavior throughout the story reinforces the project's goal of depicting AI as a beneficial, stable partner in human affairs.
